title: Seared Beef And Oranges With Arugula
summary: Seared Beef And Oranges With Arugulan is a gluten free and dairy free main course. One portion of this dish contains around 23g of protein, 26g of fat, and a total of 381 calories. For $4.44 per serving, this recipe covers 23% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals. This recipe serves 4. 1 person were impressed by this recipe. If you have olive oil, beef tenderloin, kosher salt and pepper, and a few other ingredients on hand, you can make it. To use up the kosher salt you could follow this main course with the Low Fat Crumbs Cake (Kosher-Dairy) as a dessert. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes around 30 minutes. All things considered, we decided this recipe deserves a spoonacular score of 71%. This score is solid. Try Seared Beef Tenderloin With Arugula & Mushrooms, Seared Salmon with Oranges and Fennel, and Seared Duck Breasts With Blood Oranges for similar recipes.
